hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Map Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Arrows (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #1# major item.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: This isn't where I parked my horse!

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Broken Sword# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

GV (Waterfall).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #the Keaton Mask# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #0# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #0# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #2# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found in #the Market#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Gerudo Training Ground# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# a melody and boulders conceal...^ #a Small Key Ring# and #a Spirit Temple Compass#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #an Ice Cavern Compass#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #0# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the real Phantom Ganon is bright and loud.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.
